com.intel.fightclub.cloud.upload

Class UploadScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.fightclub.cloud.upload.UploadScheduler

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class UploadScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles scheduling upload services. Any new upload services that are created should probably be added here.

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleOneoffUploadTask

        public static boolean scheduleOneoffUploadTask(@NonNull
                                               android.content.Context context,
                                               @NonNull
                                               CompletableTask task,
                                               boolean onlyOnPreferredConnection)
        Schedules an one-off upload task.
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        onlyOnPreferredConnection - Whether the user's preferred connection setting should be respected or ignored. i.e. If backups are set to wi-fi only, setting this to true will only upload if the device is connected to wi-fi. Setting it to false will ignore the preference and upload regardless of connection type.
        Returns:
        True if the upload task was successfully scheduled.

      • schedulePeriodicLogUpload

        public static boolean schedulePeriodicLogUpload(@NonNull
                                                android.content.Context context)
        Schedules a periodic task for log upload.
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        Returns:
        True if the upload task was successfully scheduled.

      • cancelAllScheduledUploads

        public static void cancelAllScheduledUploads(@NonNull
                                             android.content.Context context)
        Cancels all pending upload tasks.
